text.*:
Bacillary peliosis is a form of peliosis hepatis that has been associated with bacteria in the genus Bartonella.[1]

References[edit]

  1. ^ Koehler JE, Sanchez MA, Garrido CS, et al. (December 1997). "Molecular epidemiology of bartonella infections in patients with bacillary angiomatosis-peliosis". N. Engl. J. Med. 337 (26): 1876–83. doi:10.1056/NEJM199712253372603. PMID 9407154.
